name: Chunky Cheerleader - Chapter One
description: Chunky Cheerleader is a choice driven visual novel. Featuring 5 differing story paths to explore and over 250 unique Daz3d images to tell the story.  You play as an adult college student who has just joined the Cheerleading team, however you never could say no to food. Will you end up as the Chunky Cheerleader, too fat for the team. Or will you manage to fatten up the other team members and make the whole squad chunky, or bigger... This is Chapter One released for free as a demo of sorts, the following Chapters will be charged for.
